The Yunnan Dongyuan Zhujiawan Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in the Zhaotong area of Yunnan Province

operators: Zhenxiong Zhujiawan Coal Industry Co Ltd
owners: Yunnan Dongyuan Coal & Power Co., Ltd
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Zhenxiong Zhujiawan Coal Industry Co Ltd and owned by Yunnan Dongyuan Coal & Power Co., Ltd.
